about_the_game:
Player will receive an item called Legendary Painting. It will increase player's popularity by 2x when placed on the museum.

Once the DLC is purchased, the items can be claimed from SiLambat pickup point. Note that each DLC can only be claimed once on each save file.

========================================================================

Pemain akan mendapatkan Lukisan Legendaris. Barang ini akan memberikan bonus popularitas sebanyak 2x saat diletakkan di museum

Setelah pembelian, item dalam DLC dapat diambil di SiLambat. Setiap DLC hanya bisa diambil sekali dalam tiap save file.

Once the DLC is purchased, the items can be claimed from SiLambat pickup point. Note that each DLC can only be claimed once on each save file.

name: Monster Museum - Legendary Painting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
